data.title: The Thunderbird Inn
data.meta_description: The Thunderbird Inn is Savannah, GA's classic roadside motel. Originally built in 1964, this Savannah, GA Hotel of Choice has been totally renovated and now features 42 well-designed and stylishly appointed rooms. Conveniently located on West Oglethorpe Avenue in downtown Savannah, Georgia, the Thunderbird Inn is just a short walk away from everything in the Historic District including City Market, River Street, the Civic Center and Savannah College of Art and Design (SCAD) student housing. Our Front Desk is open 24 hours a day.
data.text: The Thunderbird Inn is Savannah, GA's classic roadside motel. Originally built in 1964, this Savannah, GA Hotel of Choice has been totally renovated and now features 42 well-designed and stylishly appointed rooms. Conveniently located on West Oglethorpe Avenue in downtown Savannah, Georgia, the Thunderbird Inn is just a short walk away from everything in the Historic District including City Market, River Street, the Civic Center and Savannah College of Art and Design (SCAD) student housing. Our Front Desk is open 24 hours a day. Our knowledgeable staff will gladly assist with staff picks, local information, directions, tour tickets, dinner reservations and sightseeing tours. Just let us know how we can make your stay more enjoyable. From our great rates and convenient downtown Savannah, GA location to our courteous Front Desk staff and friendly housekeepers to our comfortable rooms, plush pillow-top bed, quirky-named toiletries beds â€“ you'll love it all at the NEW Thunderbird! Bring Fido, we're pet-friendly!
